str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To make sober-minded, admonish, control. From sophron; to make of sound mind, i.e. to discipline or correct.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Loving one's husband. From philos and aner; fond of man, i.e. Affectionate as a wife.
Loving one's children. From philos and teknon; fond of one's children, i.e. Maternal.
